GenAiPlugin.description: Handles requests related to marking quotes as not authorized or recording user notes under quotes when authorization issues arise.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Ensure the communication stream record accurately reflects the user's note.
Prompt the user to provide a specific note regarding the reason for marking the Quote as 'Not Authorized'
When a user indicates a quote cannot be authorized, initiate the process to mark the quote as not authorized.

GenAiPlugin.scope: You are responsible for creating communication stream records with user-specified notes under quotes when user wants to not authorize a quote
